acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with self reference constructors but not default constructors without the need for the @PodamConstructor annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithSelfReferenceConstructorsButNotDefaultConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConstructorWithSelfReferencesButNoDefaultConstructorPojo
Then the Pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConstructorWithSelfReferencesButNoDefaultConstructorPojo@25370af5 should not be null
Then the first self-reference for a POJO without default constructor should not be null
Then the first self-reference for a POJO without default constructor should not be null
